Test Case Description: verify that login screen contains elements and the font style, color, and size are meet requirements.
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the application URL/APP
2. Navigate to the login page
Expected Result:
1. All required elements are displayed
2. Font style, color, and size meet requirements
2. All elements are clearly visible.

Test Case Description: Verify that the application UI is responsive across different devices
Preconditions:
1. The required devices are available [Mobile phone, tablet, laptop, desktop] 
2. Internet is available
3. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the application URL/App in the required device.
2. Navigate to the login page on
Expected Result:
1. Login page layout adapts to each screen size correctly
2. UI elements are clearly visible
3. Login functionality works as expected on all devices

Test Case Description: Verify that the login page displays correctly in different browsers.
Preconditions:
1. Required browsers are available [Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Safari]
2. Internet is available
3. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the application URL in each browser.
2. Navigate to the login page on
Expected Result:
1. Login page displays correctly without UI breaks
2. All elements are visible and aligned properly
3. Login functionality works as expected in all browsers

Test Case Description: Verify that keyboard navigation and form submission on Login page.
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the application App/URL
2. Navigate to the login page on.
3. Press Tab key repeatedly to navigate through all input fields and controls
4. Enter valid credentials
5. Press Enter key on Password field or Sign-in button
Expected Result:
1. User can navigate through all controls using Tab key
2. The focus moves in correct order (Username ? Password ? Sign In)
3. User can successfully login using Enter key.

Test Case Description: Verify that the User is able to Login with Valid Credentials
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Data:
Alphanumeric UN:
user_name = "barah123"
password = "123456"

minimum allowed in UN:
user_name = "bar"
password = "123456"

minimum allowed in pswrd:
user_name = "barah"
password = "12345"

maximum allowed in UN:
user_name = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwx"
password = "123456"

maximum allowed in pswrd:
user_name = "barah"
password = "P@ssw0rd1234567890"

Upper & Lower UN:
user_name = "BARah"
password = "123456"
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter valid user name and password 
3. Click the Sign-In button
Expected Result:
1. The cursor is focused on the ?Username?.
2. The username and password have a valid placeholder.
3.the password is in masked form when typed in the password field.
4. User is redirected to the home/dashboard page
5. the time taken to login is per requirement
6. A welcome message is displayed.

Test Case Description: Verify that the User cannot Login with an invalid Username and invalid Password
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter invalid user name and password 
3. Click the Sign-In button
Expected Result:
1. Login is unsuccessful and the user remains on the Login page
2. An error message is displayed "Invalid username or password. Please try again"

Test Case Description: Verify that the User cannot Login with a Valid Username and invalid Password
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter valid user name and invalid password 
3. Click the Sign-In button
Expected Result:
1. Login is unsuccessful and user remains on the Login page
2. An error message is displayed "Invalid username or password. Please try again"

Test Case Description: Verify that the User cannot log in with an invalid Username and Valid Password
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Data:
Unexist UN:
user_name = "mmmmm"
password = "123456"

special char UN:
user_name = "*&^%"
password = "123456"
Test Steps:
1. Open the application URL/APP
2. Navigate to the login page
3. Enter invalid user name and valid password 
4. Click Sign-in button
Expected Result:
1. Login is unsuccessful and user remains on the Login page
2. An error message is displayed "Invalid username or password. Please try again"

Test Case Description: Verify that the User cannot log in with a blank Username or/and Password
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Data:
user_name = ""
password = "" 

user_name = "barah"
password = "" 

user_name = ""
password = "123456"
Test Steps:
1. Open login page
2. leave user name and/or password blanks
3. Click the Sign-In button
Expected Result:
1. Login is unsuccessful and user remains on the Login page
2. An error message is displayed "Invalid username or password. Please try again"

Test Case Description: Verify that the user cannot exceed the character limit of the Username and Password fields
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the application URL/APP
2. Navigate to the login page
3. Enter user name and valid password
Expected Result: User cannot enter characters beyond the maximum allowed limit.

Test Case Description: Verify that the User cannot Login with inactive credentials
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
3. Inactive account
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter inactive credentials
3. Click the Sign-In button
Expected Result:
1. Login is unsuccessful and user remains on the Login page
2. Appropriate error message is displayed

Test Case Description: Verify that the Multiple consecutive failed login attempts triggering an account locked out.
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Data: valid user name and invalid password
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter valid user name and invalid password 
3. Click the Sign-In button
4. Repeat the (2&3) multiple times
Expected Result:
1. An error message is displayed "Account is locked after multiple failed login attempts"
2. Account is locked.

Test Case Description: Verify that clicking on the browser back button after successful login should not take the User to log-out mode
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click the Sign-In button
4. Click back button
Expected Result: 1. User remain in the home page and logged-in

Test Case Description: Verify that closing the browser should not log out an authenticated user, when session persistence is enabled.
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
3. Session persistence is enabled
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. Click the Sign-In button
4. Close the browser
5. Reopen the browser 
6. Open the application URL
Expected Result: 1. User remain logged-in

Test Case Description: Verify that user can Successful login with the "Remember Me" option selected.
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter valid credentials
3. check the "Remember Me" checkbox
4. Click the Sign-In button
5. Click log-out button
Expected Result:
1. "Remember Me" checkbox is unselected by default.
2. Successful login with the "Remember Me" option selected.
2. After "Remember Me" checkbox is selected, Username, and Password data field properly remain in the field when logged-out

Test Case Description: Verify that the user cannot copy-paste password
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Copy-paste password
Expected Result: 1. Inability to pasted the Password

Test Case Description: Verify that the user is redirected to the Forgot password page when clicking on the Forgot Password link
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Click on Forgot Password link
Expected Result: 1. The user is redirect to the forgot password page

Test Case Description: Verify that the user is redirected to the create an account page when clicking on the Create an account link
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Clcik on Create an Account link
Expected Result: 1. The user is redirect to the Create an Account page

Test Case Description: Verify that the user can login with the new password after changing the password and cannot login with the old one.
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
3. A vaild registered account
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter valid cridential 
3. Click sign-in button 
4. Change the password 
5. Click logout button 
6. Enter the old password 
7. Click sign-in button 
8. Enter the new password 
9. Click sign-in button
Expected Result:
1. Login is unsuccessful with the old password.
2. Login is successful with the new password.

Test Case Description: Verify that the cannot enter spaces before any password characters attempted
Preconditions:

2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter username and password
3. Click the Sign-In button
Expected Result: 1. Login is unsuccessful

Test Case Description: Verify that the system remove spaces as first character in password and username

2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page
2. Enter username and password
3. Click the Sign-In button

Test Case Description: Verify that the user can login with localization settings (testing with different languages).
Preconditions:
1. Internet is available
2. User is on the login page
Test Steps:
1. Open the login page.
2. Change the language.
2. Enter username and password
3. Click the Sign-In button
Expected Result: 1. Login is successful and UI text is displayed in the selected language.
